ocean.question: I'm big and blue, fish swim in me, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm made of water!
🚢 Boats need me to travel.
🐠 Fish live in me.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish, often found in groups, and I like to hide in anemones. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a type of saltwater fish.
🧡 I am orange, white, and black.
🏠 I live in a stinging plant.

ocean.question: I'm a giant animal that lives in the ocean, I sing songs, and I have a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🎵 You can hear me far away.
💨 I breathe air out of a hole.

ocean.question: I have eight arms, live in the ocean, and squirt ink to hide. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🎨 I can make the water dark.
💪 I have many arms to help me move.

ocean.question: I am a very large fish that eats tiny creatures and has a very big mouth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I swim in the ocean.
🌾 I only eat tiny creatures.
😮 I have a very large mouth.

ocean.question: I live in a shell and crawl slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am a mollusk
🏠 I always carry my house on my back.
⏳ I am not very fast.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean made of tiny animals that build hard homes. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I am made of many small creatures.
🌈 I am very colorful.
🐟 Many fish like to live in me.

ocean.question: I am a very big wave caused by an earthquake under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be very destructive.
🌏 I start with an earthquake.
🇯🇵 I am also known as a harbor wave.

ocean.question: I am a strong, swirling current in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I move water around the globe.
🌡️ I can affect the temperature of the water.
➡️ I move in a circular pattern.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌑 I'm a very dark and mysterious place.
🕳️ I'm like a really deep hole.
🌊 I'm in the Pacific Ocean.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am crunchy and orange (sometimes!)
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me
🌱 I grow under the ground

plant.question: I am big and tall, and I have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have a strong, brown trunk
🍃 My leaves change color in the fall
🌳 I give shade on a sunny day

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I come in many different colors
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me
🌸 I grow in gardens and fields

plant.question: I am long and green and good to eat. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am often used in salads or pickles
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow
🌿 I am related to pumpkins

plant.question: I have thorns and smell nice. People give me to people they love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, but I can be other colors too
🥀 I am a symbol of love
🌿 Be careful of my prickly stems

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when it gets hot. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a yellow plant
🍿 I taste good with butter and salt
🔥 Heat makes me jump!

plant.question: I am a plant with a hard shell. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tall tree near the beach
🥥 My insides are white and sweet
🐒 Monkeys need to crack me open to eat me

plant.question: I am a green plant that can be spicy or sweet. I am often put on sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🌶️ I can be red, yellow, or green
🥪 I add a lot of flavor to food
🌱 Some varieties are very hot!

plant.question: I am a small, green plant that grows in your lawn. You can walk on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ I am often found in parks and playgrounds
🌱 I am made of many tiny blades
☀️ I need water and sunshine to grow thick and green

plant.question: I am a plant that has a very strong smell and makes people cry when they cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am often used in cooking
😭 I can make your eyes water
🌱 I grow underground, like a bulb
